button.Name: Close

Slider.name: Threshold
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to determine when ComBot should perform a dropoff."]

TextEntry.name: DropoffContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your dropoff location. If you are delivering to a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name."]

Textentry.name: Dropoff
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffType} { case Corporation Folder This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break } This.ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

listbox.Name: DropoffType
listbox.OnSelect: Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config:SetDropoffType[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:ClearItems switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffType} { case Corporation Folder UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler].ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[DropoffContainer@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[DropoffContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide break case Container UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler].ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select UIElement[DropoffContainer@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[DropoffContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText[Container Name] UIElement[DropoffContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show break case Personal Hangar UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[DropoffContainer@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[DropoffContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide }
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field determines how ComBot should drop off cargo after it reaches the dropoff location."]

Textentry.name: Pickup
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Orca or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

listbox.Name: PickupList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Orca or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

TextEntry.name: PickupContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your pickup location. If you are picking up from an Orca, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Orca. If you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name. This field is also used to specify the prefix for corporate bookmarks created using the Corporate Jetcan mode."]

Text.name: PickupSubTypeTitle
Text.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan break case Corporation Folder This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break case Container This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break default This:Hide }

listbox.Name: PickupSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan] break case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break default This:Hide } This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupSubType}]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your pickup type for types that have additional options, like Jetcans."]

listbox.Name: PickupType
listbox.OnLoad:
This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType}]:Select UIElement[PickupSubType@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:ClearItems

UIElement[PickupSubType@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[PickupTitle@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText[Pickup Station Bookmark] UIElement[PickupContainerTitle@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[PickupContainer@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Hide UIElement[PickupSubType@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[PickupTitle@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText[Mining System Bookmark] UIElement[PickupContainerTitle@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText[Orca Pilot Name] UIElement[PickupContainerTitle@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[PickupContainer@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show UIElement[PickupSubType@PickupFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:Show
